To know if the vehicle gear box is engaged with any of the gears. When it is engaged there is no wiggle room. So the driver can intuitively know the vehicle is “in“ gear as it is said.
This is important when a new driver starts the vehicle. If the gear is not checked and if the vehicle is started, the vehicle jumps forward. This hurts the battery and the engine. Also it shows the driver is an L-Board(never tail an L board even if she is miss universe, you will meet with an accident).
When you start any thing, not just a vehicle one has to check if everything that is required for the activity is available. The wiggle check is one such simple but crucial activity, that has become an habit for the stick shift drivers.

Start by Problem Solving with Coding. Code should flow from your fingers the moment you feel that you understand a problem. I have been proponent of Mastery and being in Zen like Flow. Meditation and Problem Solving are two places out of many, where you can be in such a state of flow.
There are two ways of solving the problem, one is using the closed form equation(Wave Equation for example), and another is using Algorithmic process(Gradient Descent that is used extensively). When you solve real world problems, it is always using Algorithms. We might use closed form equations in some steps.
Take simple physics problems and try coding them, plotting the equations. Use Sympy library, along with Matplotlib. Start playing around with python visualisation, and sympy algebraic solvers. There are couple of books that talk of simulating physics, math and real world problem with python (search for them in google, here I am unable to share). Solve the exercise in those books. (I am a mechanical engineer by training, and it is exhilarating feeling to see the problems getting solved and test cases pass)
The business problems out there need multiple conditions to be checked, and finally decisions to be made. So the main objective of Data Science is to solve countless problems and find these conditions. That too repetitively, at high speed and using available resources. Coding is the only way.

Accuracy is used in Classification problem, and in NLP, the classification algorithms are used in many situations. Whether to categorize a data as positive or negative like Spam or Not Spam. Or to divide the given data into arbitrary categories like identifying the part of essay.
The objective of the ML is not the “Correct Answer”, that is accuracy. Objective of ML is to “Fit” the model close enough. (If there was a way to get the correct answer, using closed form equations is better than ML. This is one of the reasons, why I started learning problem solving and competitive coding on online judges platform. It helps you reason logically about the answer provided by the ML model. Most of the times, you have to use additional problem solving on top of ML.)
Take the following example. ML model will create an equation, which tries to catch as much correct answers as possible in the given dataset. Lets take a small visualisation exercise…
The equation is in the order of power 5, and the curve it traces is very non-linear. We can intuitively say that, most of the training data has been fitted perfectly by the model. (Model will have low bias, high variance). That is overfitting.
The test data will not fit in the pattern defined by the equation. So the testing accuracy reduces drastically, compared to training accuracy. In terms of lay man, the model is not generalizing for the natural data that is created. In these cases, it is better to refer Recall and Precision, rather than using accuracy.
Recall measures what fraction of True Positives the model predicts correctly(Tp /Tp + Fn). Precision measures how accurate the positive predictions are(Tp/ Tp + Fp). That by itself says a lot about the model that is trained.
When your model is being trained, it is given a error or loss function which it needs to minimize. The lesser the error, better the fit. Model continues reducing the loss every epoch, and after a particular level of loss, the accuracy of the test data starts reducing while training data accuracy is increasing. Which means, as the model is training it is overfitting the data.
There are some solutions for this condition.
The objective of the ML as highlighted already is not correct answer, but to find insights into the data. To explain how certain features have effect on the final outcome. Like in doing Real Science Experiments. Some of these experiments can lead to laws like Newton’s laws of physics, and other will lead to models like the weather prediction models that we have today.

Try coding one simplest program on a competitive programming platform like DMOJ. You will understand how life changing it can be. You will know everything about the logic, the syntax will be correct, the code you have typed will be prefect and yet two or three test cases fail.
Hours together is spent to not solve the problem but to learn the problem and take care of every mode of failure that you program can undergo. When you spend that muh time and get the solution correct, means the solution will for sure work in real world. That is how real world excellent programs are written. Excellent programmers can become good leaders, solely for their logical thinking and their thoroughness.
Many who intuitively solve the problem think such level of detail is unwanted. when their solution fails in real world they blame the nature or others.Seldom do they hold themselves responsible. They loose their credibility, get demoted and even loose their jobs.
I have been one of those intuitive thinkers. Now with training in programming I realise how important is Logic along with knowledge about the world and the subject. In fact the subject knowledge is useful to test the program than actually programming. Only the expert can come up with extremely rare test cases because he experienced it. But by persevering with the problem, the programmer can imagine test cases that might create problem and work for the same much before the problem happens.
We are programming in real life at many places. At our work, in our kitchen, with our family and friends. Most of the time we struggle because we missed one important point that comes and haunts us back. With programming, you will force yourself to slowdown. Think through the problem inside out. Those who think logically in these these places will progress faster and more easily.
There are downsides too but they are not logically valid downsides. Like overthinking, laziness and unwanted negative biases. These are there whether you one thinks through the problem or not. Problem solving is more profitable than thinking that solving the problem might lead to new problems. (You see illogic in our biases and negative thinking)
When you ask the question, whether it is Logical? Then your brain automatically compartmentalises the problems that you have and the problem you are working on. Have a great time gaining problem solving skills.

At your Home… Real Politics starts at individual house and it propagates to the nation.
It is important to have a political philosophy first. The odds are 7 in 10 that you are in the late teens, because the interest in politics start during that age. You want to influence something that is outside you.
If you learn political philosophy at this age, and get the mindset to contribute to the society, it is a great opportunity. An opportunity to contribute and administer. An opportunity to serve.
If you chose the other route of politicking to profit for yourself, then your imagination is enough. Since the self-enriching political thinking is in-built in to our psyche. In simple words, we are all selfish. We will do many things unimaginable to satisfy ourself. You are your own teacher in this Politics.
So decide which route you want to take, then decide which philosophy you want to side with in your life. Choosing the wrong philosophy can equally ruin your life, like drinking poison. Hence be wary of many ideas that are circulating through the media, books, movie and even songs.
After the above two decision then you are set for life. Really, because the philosophy can be all consuming. Try watching the Harvard course on Political Philosophy in Youtube. You will immediately connect with the ideas in that course.
Have a fabulous life ahead.

Yes, a lot of things can be done with one hand including typing on you keyboard. There is a layout of keyboard invented by Dvorak, which can be learnt fast and used effectively. If they learn shortcuts in keyboard then they can avoid using mouse altogether.

Most of the robots in the factories are one handed. They just do multiple action using a single arm. Human arms are more versatile and flexible than the robot arms.
Depending on the type of vehicle one has, they can even drive with one hand. Challenge is they will not be given license, due to the handicap. However with one left hand, vehicle can be driven with more practicing.
It comes to practicing and believing that with one hand many activities can be done. Most of them are fun too.

Among the many skills that one needs to master, looking far into future and gain perspective is the top most. This skill is needed by the managerial and entrepreneurial role.
It is surprising that problems you have today will be no more in a week's time, but replaced with another. The ability to foresee that in a positive way is what this skill provides.
Once you have that, and master it the world will be seen in weeks, months, years and decades. It is confusing at first, until you take a goal and think about its time horizon. Some activity or goals can be achieved in a moments notice like buying a book or getting a new gadget.
Then there are goals that will take time. To master engineering, learning to swim, profieciency in a new language. We need to give a longer time in weeks to years.
Then comes changing your character, personality, experiences, loving oneself and your stature in the society. These will take decades. These visions are concrete and stable to large extent. Money, fames, attention and attractive relationships are achieved in similar manner however they vanish without a moment notice. These are false visions.
Now think about this for your job, business, family and life as a whole. This kind of thinking is what makes the difference. This is a skill that is mother of other skills. Master it and then you dont need a master.

We all are artists of our own lives.
To draw the reality and freeze it on a frame is a skill that is much sought after. In reading Leonardo Da Vinci Biography, in which there are couple of pithy advices that I came across.
Be curious and observe the nature around you every moment
Your skill as artist is equivalent to how elegantly you can make a 3d object on a 2d plane of the canvas
Nature has no sharp lines
Shadows are your friend when you want to make the object stand out on canvas.
Learn how shadows change and interact with colour
Learn how the human eyes work
Learn the laws of Perspective and how light impinges on surfaces
Learn the proportions of human body not just in rest, but in motion
Take a notebook always with you to draw the humans in their own environment, doing things animatedly
Mix your interest in art and science to understand the world better.
I would really suggest to read Leonardo. More ideas will pop out. Have a great day.

Before answering your question, one has to realise what an MBA school offers and how it can help and detract you from achieving your vision.
Understand the major USP of any business school. It gives you a learning environment that is fast paced, collaborative, course work that brings you upto speed on envisioning future, tech, strategy and everyday business tactics. Along with this it shares an alumni that becomes available to you once you leave the school. But you have to do the grunt work and make a name for yourself.
MBA and Driving school an analogy:
It is like going to driving school and learn driving. You get a place with all levels of roads, difficulties and get a group of like minded people around you learning to drive. Then you are licensed by that school, that you are good at driving, in this case driving a business or a part of it.
Trading Time for.Money
The above method is costly but very useful to fast track your life. In that process you get indebted to banks that have anticipated such a demand in us to fast track. I am not saying that MBA schools are not required and should not be joined. On the contrary, you should join the MBA if you are really having vision for your life and know that taking the course will help you in that.
Now think about the other way of getting all the above by yourself. Two things are going to be spent, one is your time and another is your energy.
Why I say time?
Think about the course work you have to search and learn, the evenings after work you learn about business frameworks, weekends that you spend honing your communication skills through toastmaster or dale carnegie classes.
Why I say energy?
To find the books and people to work with will need energy more.than time. Being creative in practicing what you learn again is a major energy consuming process. Also the failures that you face in real life with your own money, energy and time requires you to be a strong character and personality.
Think about these points and then take a decision that is very long term oriented. After all you are gonna live atleast 90 years, so why hurry is my thinking. There are others who ask, why not hurry, because every other tom, dick and harry is choosing MBA route and becoming prosperous. They will have a family that leaves a legacy behind, right?
Set your vision
But what you want with your life and why you want it? Answer that and then your decision will be easier. Have a wonderful future.

I am person who can start a business and grow it. Here is what I will do.
I will have deep knowledge of the product I want to sell
I will keenly observe and learn more deeply how customers use it. What challenges they face.
Next i will work on building a team for approaching the customers who have the problem they want to solve. Again here to I observe whether they want to solve it in the first place and pay for it. If not there is no business.
Never do something you are good at for free. Even if you volunteer ensure you learn about the people and the problem they are fascing. Like I volunteer to answer questions in quora, so I can learn the challenges faced by many people.
I will show enthusiasm and eagerness to the customer and try genuinely solve the problem. I will pull the team inside my company to solve the problem.
I will hone my solving skills of working with the customer and my team at the same time. This interpersonal skill is the difference between a person who can grow and not grow a business.
Whether you are a chief executive or a worker on the shop floor the intention has to be in providing solutions. Then the business will grow.
Summary: Keen observation, Drive to grow, Intention to solve, interpersonal skills and ingenious way of creating a better future. All these makes a business grow. If not there, then business stops growing and dies.

Reading Leonardo, his all time companion was his notebook which he used to record the drawings of people and their expressions. Observing those around you, and drawing them is a great way.
Another method is a variation on the above. Instead of people drawing the things and building around you. Doing that in many perspective will be a great exercise on your skill.
Next is to imagine a juxtaposition of different things say a table and aeroplane. Or a bird and a computer keyboard. Trying these ideas methodically can lead to awesome sketches and analogies.
Bringing the picture alive by shading and shadows is another important aspect that I am incorporating in my doodles. It makes a lot of difference to see a flat picture to a shaded 3D ones. It is mesmeric.
There are various ways to hatch a shade, you can work on that too.
Last but not the least drawing your imagination. Try thinking for a moment and see what picture arises to your consciousness. Draw that.
Hope it helps.

Learning Japanese : Japanese is like Hindi, its alphabet (kana), its grammatical make up, the transformation in the verbs, adjectives are similar to Hindi. To learn kanji, it will take more times and practice. While reading and writing kana will come in a week or so. Practice is the code.
Japanese has a lot of resources on the internet. Literally GBs of data and immense research information is available.Also there are lot teachers and students learning Japanese too. Based on these it is better to go for japanese.
Work opportunities: More Japanese companies are trying to enter and benefit from india growth story.
I have first hand experience with Japanese company for past 6 years and learnt japanese for JLPT and gave N5 and N4. Yep failed in N3, it needs more dedication and it was bit tough. Now I am again working towards passing it.
I have worked with Korean companies too and there are also similar opportunites. I have not learnt Korean but worked with Korean expats. I felt Japanese are bit more traditional and by the book, while Koreans are more sophisticated and risk taking. Japanese are methodical in following the business framework and so are Koreans. Both are very similar when running business but Japanese have a longer vision. This is important for any indian trying to breaking into the companies.
Conclusion: I have not given any information on korean language here. So find the information about the ease of learning and practicing it. Then list down the pro, con and your inclination to pick up a language. Language need not be used only for making money, you can enjoy the literature and make new friends and opportunities. Think expansively and take a wise decision. Have a great day.

Got recently stumped by your instincts eh?
The answer is your amygdala. The reptile brain inside our human brain. All the logic and reason was a very recent development for the bipeds before that, the life depended on snap judgement. Amygdala helped with that efficiently and got our ancestors to survive.
Thanks to it today we are here to ask questions about emotions. Along came many mutations as our ancestors procreated (had lot of sex because of same amygdala) and which lead to creation of the limbic brain to cover amygdala and its close relations the thalamus pair and hyppocampus. On top of limbic system came cerebral brain which is mostly used for talking, planning, cooperation and long term thinking.
Much research is done to wean us humans of this pesky emotions. Science pure science. you may read lot of novels and see movies where the villain or protagonist is emotionless. To my knowledge we are no where close to achieving it. I really love to be a emotional animal than a machine like Spock,🤣🤣
Other way to circumvent your amygdala is programming it with meditation and affirming thoughts. Work on being self aware and spreading happiness. Good day.

Easiest way is to get a internal transfer in your existing organisation. You can become a junior PM after you have taken a course in product management.
If you are having a good product idea, you can pitch it to your management and offer to make that idea real. However be sure to validate the idea before you can start the project.
Gathering theory knowledge is very simple through the various books. Then you can take updated PM courses in Udemy or Coursera. After that do some case studies of the existing apps and products to hone the skills.
All these are done to familiarise yourself with the process the PM has to undertake. Learning software design cycles, prototyping methods, customer profiling also needs practice. Of all, learn to listen actively and become a team player.

Japanese like any language is learnt by practice. There are advantages for Japanese learners.
There are lot of books written to speed up learning
There are audio books that can be listened
There are websites that let you practice questions and give you answers
JLPT exams happen every 6 months once which could be a good target motivation to learn language.
Every city has Japanese teaching centers and even free lancers teach by online and offline methods. Just ask google maps for Japanese learning.
If you are in school or in college, get your friend to learn along with you. This will help because, japanese language speaking can be learnt in 3 months. Learning to read kana will take 6 months. Kanji will take well over a year or 2.
Committed pupils learn and go places with this language. With the advent of translators, you get more idea on how to manage your vocabs.
Japanese has rich culture, fascinating and open minded people and very lively social life. So go ahead, what are you waiting for??
Have a great time.

Long time can be 1 yr or 45 yrs depending on the personality and character of the employee.
Once you do the same thing you start seeing the pattern in the problems and solutions that arise. From that you will see the big picture of the system surrounding the job.
After that stage is the creativity stage where you start innovating by moving the activity that you do in the job.
If you develop related skills of public speaking and being persuasive, then you might create a following around you and make the job that you do more lucrative. Today, most of the jobs involve automation to some extent, and your expertise in that job will make you most sought after.
After achieving this, you will take more bigger responsiblity of managing the team of people doing that same job. Trying to teach them and learning your skills from the perspective of the new generation. You will be still learning your skill to be done in different ways.
So yep doing a same job for long time can be interesting.

World has problems and challenges at every turn. Some are needed to be solved to make it better. The startup that is best solves a problem that is severe, becoming prevalent and frequent. Market is growing. This is foremost requirement.
Also the solutions to these problems have to be viable, usable, feasible and finally provide value to the person having problem. Then only the customers would pay for it.
Next decision to make is the money you can charge for the solutions. The more you can charge, more people have the problem and easily you can automate the solutions the startup will have best returns. Google is the best example and so is quora.
Product managers all around the world look for solutions that solve the problems that are subtle and seems not required to be solved. For example today all experts are reachable at a click and still it we have to build rapport, trust each other before we enter into any cooperative activity. Can this be solved?
A platform for lawyers and the those who want solutions could be an example solution. Will lawyers want such platform or will the users trust the lawyers? It might already be there, I have not researched this idea as I right. You get the idea.
The best startup or solution is found by the Build, Measure and Learn cycle of development. The art of observing how the customer reacts with your product or service will tell you lot more than your own intuition. This cycle will shorten the losses or risk that any development has.
Be ready to pivot if the solution is not required or doesn't pay. Your role as founder or innovator is to work on reducing the risk and providing a solution that is pays for itself and makes money to pay your bills.
It is fascinating out there, just explore and you will find myriad problems and infinite solutions. Have a phenomenal time developing your startup.

Curiosity is wonderful gift to have.
To make and sell stuff is is not the only reason, why one has to work day and night. Challenging part is really to find, why, how, and when to make and sell these stuffs. It is fascinating to learn about your fellow humans with whom you share the world. If you observe them, you will see pattern in everything they do. Even the way I answer, you can find pattern. Learning is nothing but finding the pattern.
Why find these patterns you ask? Because, you can predict what will happen in the future. How about having a time machine inside your own brain… That is what you get when you find a pattern. It takes lot of time to learn the patterns.
Even after learning the pattern, more time is spend in logically deciding which pattern will predict the future. Because most of the time, our fellow humans make mistakes and lie. I am sure, you have experienced that your classmates, even your friends lie to you. One of the strategy to circumvent lying and mistakes is to observe them in prolonged duration in various situation. You will eventually find a pattern.
When you find these patterns, then you can understand what problems they are facing. You can find a solution for them, for which they will pay. We humans want everything like magic, technology today equals to magic, yet want it at lowest cost.
You get the whole idea… The more you delve into your question, and search for the answers, you will understand that inorder to make anything takes a lot of time. Try creating a simple art of boy playing with his friend on a beach on a sunny day, where the big ships are harbored at a distance. Add birds flying above them. One of the birds diving to catch its morning breakfast in the sea…. That is a simple drawing, with so much information. That is how, many products are today.
I hope, I have made you ask more questions than I answered you. Have a fun and curious time

Question is how to create stable professions that create opportunity for rural youth, correct?
Decouple the skill attainment from the work. Approach the challenges by simplifying them. Lets take work creation first.
What is Work?
Work is a lifeblood of human beings. work they choose will define their purpose and perspective in life. We rarely see any way to achieve our life goals without work. However many forget that having a work that is rewarding and fulfilling itself a very important goal.
Do stable professions exist?
Stable professions may not be rewarding for everyone. We can see evidence all around us in the way of theft, mis handling of responsiblity, power politics and so on. Humans always seek power any where they go after they stabilise, it is in our DNA and harmones. If our goal is to survive peacefully, we have to manage this challenge first. Then, providing stable jobs will come.
How work n workers defined?
Work is defined by the skills, vision and the culture of the organization. While a job seeker is defined by his skills and vision. The missing link is the culture n vision in job seeker.
Are there organisation that helps the youth to create their vision?
No. Think which is more challenging, skill development or culture development. We as a country need to create organization which instills culture and vision in the growing job seekers which can then be matched with the companies. Schools and colleges are factory for churning out workers with skills and certifiying their skill level. But the vision of those individuals are crushed by that process.
How to solve the challenges of rural youth?
Stable income has to be provided by the government or a non profit. Ensure that youth are training to get a vision. They are given an environment to try out their vision and see if they love it. And then let loose on the world. It is similar to how early philosophers thought about grooming the politicians.
How will government or the organization subsidise the youth?
This is a big question that you are really asking. No one person can come up with a single answer. Lives have to be spent on changing the current scenario. I leave this question open not because I don't know the answer. Because I dont want to answer it. One who answers will not do it verbally, he will show it in action and outcomes.
Have a remarkable day. Awaiting your comments and feedback.

Honestly, to make anyone learn something their curiosity has to be increased. The five year olds are more curious about learning how the world works around them by touching, licking and feeling them.
Try showing them the patterns in the tables say two tables will go like,
2 4 6 8 …
Three tables go like
3 6 9 12..
Four
4 8 12 16
You get the idea. Once the kid sees the pattern, his mind will predict what comes next. Then learning tables thru school becomes super easy. Atleast that is my belief.
Vedic math is also based on the pattern recognition and finding different tactics.
On top of learning pattern, learning to add vedic method will help as the kids grow. But that is not for 5 year olds, let them have fun some more years before they sit on their bums and start calculating.

It is like my boss asking me this question.
Leaders reach the pinnacle of success because they give importance to even tiniest details. The world even though complex is made of tiny things. Each part of a process or product might have many states, and if one part is wrongly fitted then entire part will fail.
Consider the application forms or bank form where you are filling the numbers. All it takes for the application to create huge trouble is a misplaced 0. How many transactions and online application are refilled daily because, it was done in hurry? There are certain job, which are mission critical where completing a job hurriedly might lead to loss of lives.
There is one way to avoid the employees or even small kids doing a job hurriedly. Tell them why the job is to be done, and give them compelete autonomy in doing the job. You have to only check it, the rest they will take care.
Thanks for reading, and provide your feedback in comments

Men are different in the way we love. We ourselves don't know this.,😜
Men love themselves more when they are with what they love the most, have achieved, strived to attain in their life. Does your man love himself? Can you see him happy, and making those around him happy? Is he caring towards you? If you answer yes to one of the above question, then it is time you loved him more.
Men usually distance themselves when they are facing some challenge and they want to solve it themselves. That is how we are made, and no we are not showing our independence. Men are designed in such a foolish blueprint, which was useful in prehistoric times. We distance ourselves and then come closer when we have resolved the issue.
Finally men seek solution and want to maintain the current good condition. Not change and try something new. If your guy is reluctant in this aspect, then try to cajole him and be patient.
Have a fun life.

Your target customer has to be the sick patients relations, their parents or siblings especially. Another route is to approach the doctors who treat these patients. Third route is the pharmacies that sell the products to the sick patients or their relations.
You can use various channels like television / radio advertisements, direct marketing and social media to reach out to them. Build relationship using these channels, depending on the high touch / low touch methods.
Highlight the value that you are providing to the customer. What problem are you solving for them? What ailment your health product solves? Based on this decide the price poitn of your prodcut, decide the cost structure and calculate how your revenue streams are going to be.
You might also think about the Key partners who can support in improving your business. Also list down the key activities that can increase your reach to the customers.
I hope this provides you an overview on how to approach the challenge.

She loves her husband, and his mom and dad diffrently. A girl friend loves her male friends and his boyfriend differently. The change in pattern is very subtle.
It takes lot of discipline for men to see this in their girl friends and their partners. Challenge for women is, the male friends who they are in contact can change shades and influence women in giving something they should not to give. Simple guess. Your self-esteem is pretty low. Try increasing it.
Short term: To begin with change the location where you are, it is a very simple fix. But not a solution. Solution is deeper with in you.
Long Term : Happiness is the purpose of my life, not just mine but of everyone whom I come across. There are strategies to improve your self-esteem, to start using them, you have first decide to present in the moment. Only when you are happy, we are in the moment.
Once that sinks in, then take Psycho Cybernetics book (download it) and read it. You will get answers for most of your issues. Then discuss about it with your friends (I mean real friends who want to see you happy).
Follow it up with Book of Joy. A wonderful book that is worth to send free copies to all your friends. I did that after reading it. Hope you become free of this suffering. Have a fun life.

There is money in every business you do. What are you going to do with all the money you earn? First answer that. Using the money to experience the reality is very important.
Being a platform for the businesses themselves will be the easiest way to make more money. Like Google, Alibaba, Amazon etc, who are now platform that connects the customers to the suppliers. They are a brand, which acts as an intermediary, getting all the data from both sides of the sale.
Franchising the existing brands that sell products and services that people cannot live without is the next in line. If you want to make money, then start your own new franchise/ brand and build it to sell them. You need to be disciplined/ talented/ hard work to build it.
If you are starting out, then buying a franchise is like a house, that will provide you returns, experience of running business and contacts that you will need when you move out on your own.
Coffee shops, Burger joints, Pizza parlours, Bakeries and even car washes have got their franchises. If you love personal care related services, like hair saloon, cosmetic upgrades, even there is franchises for that. There goes, you can buy franchise or create franchise depending on your expertise
Stock Market : Trading or Investing in stocks are a very viable business if you are having idea of competitive edge.
The competitive edge is created after you have found a problem pattern, or stock price pattern. You can see the fish in the above pattern, and see that it is going upwards. You can take a bet that, it is will move up for atleast some more time. Based on that you take the stand as either buyer or seller in the market. It is a very deep subject, and requires time and skill to learn.
Consulting : Business
is based on making other business better with your expetise on the process, knowledge, strategic ideas, best practices and contacts. This is one of the low money investment high returns business.
One can do it either working for a big organisation, or working solo. Having prior work experience will help in moving this direction. There are tomes of books about this topic.
The money made depends on the energy and time you spend on any of the above businesses. Identifying a problem or need that requires a solution, or showing that there is a problem and solving it requires time. Take your time and learn more about them.
Hope you are putting some of these ideas to work. Because the moment it works others will already be competing for your profit. There is a pattern in the need of humans. It raises and falls erratically. Have a fun time catching the wave.

When I opened my Gmail in the morning today, this question struck my mind, and lead me to search it in Quora. I was delighted to find answers that were positive and challenging at the same time. I wished to see a more big picture kind of answer, and thought I must throw some light.
Google is a platform for those who want information for fulfilling their wants, needs, inspirations. Other side of the platform is those who want to share information, for meeting their wants, needs and inspirations. Google has come up with a elegant solution, win/win/win for Google, the info seekers and info providers.
Cut Search Competition
Google has built its infrastructure for profit, there is no doubt. They are shrewd and smart business people. Ideas and creativity are life blood of this company. Reading In the Plex and Trillion Dollar Coach, showed me how the bread and butter of the google business model was established. Following that The four horsemen, book on Amazon, Apple, Google and FB showed how each are eating themselves, and brink of going extinct. Funny, but that is the reality.
Big Picture
Among all these competition, and internal challenges the company is growing rapidly and doing well as of today. What will be Google after 50 years? Will they be a Search Engine giant or something different? How will we navigate the world at that time? Why will someone live and try to prosper, when he has everything he needs at his finger tips always?
Powered by Google
Maps, Search, Mail, Video streaming, Cloud storage and processing are something Google offers seamlessly to 3.5 billion smartphones, 2.5 billion computers world wide these services, through the network infrastructure built by many organisations. The livelihood of businesses, employees and even government depends on these services. (Think of a government giving mail service for free!!!). I know other companies like Yahoo, Amazon, Duck Duck Go and even FB will have the services available for free. The point I am making is the effort that had gone into build these products are mind bogling.
The effort to observe what a customer needs and fulfill that exactly, is a great art, I will miss. They have been doing this through discipline and process, and not just by hit and trial. I realized this, when I took the product manager course recently.
Torch Bearers of Web
Whether I miss Google or not, I will miss the engineers, the tech experts and importantly the senior leaders who navigated the tough environment to build this company. I am sure, somewhere in this world another Google is being made. They are having better engineers, more nimbler products and phenomenal growth capabilities. Still, I will love google for they showed the light in the forest of internet era.
Kudos to Google Engineers, Managers, Tech guys and Administrators.

It was yesterday. I tried and did well in manage a online evaluation contest in the Toastmaster club. It might seem simple to think about meetings since we do them everyday with out colleagues. However managing a contest was a unique experience. It showed me places where I can improve my coordination.
I tried and succeeded in driving down from New Delhi to Coimbatore in my Jeep, that is total of 2600 km in 41 hrs. Not straight though, I took breaks after every 900 km. It has given me confidence that I can take on bigger challenges.
I tried to learn about the job market, and how to improve our chances of getting the job that we want. The idea of using ikigai and matching your skills to what the job needs is a real eye opener.
I am learning about product management through Udemy. Till now it has shown me so many new concepts when it comes to bringing new product or services to market.
More importantly thing that I am trying and succeeding is doing the prayer of Happiness. I got the idea from Book of Joy. This is how it goes
May I/loved ones/all beings be free from suffering and its causes
May I/loved ones/all beings attain happiness and its causes
May I/loved ones/all beings never be separated from joy that is free from misery
May I/loved ones/all beings abide in equanimity that is free of attached and aversion
Happiness is a skill to be learnt and it is the purpose of a human life. A very simple and profound knowledge that makes my day a breeze to live.I am greatful to have my friends and family, even the whole world to share my life. That is one reason I joined quora and started sharing my wisdom and ideas
Finally I started listening to very soothing guided meditation tracks by Purely Lucy. A phenomenal change in attitude, faith, vibrations around me started happening. Ability to forgive and ability to move in life with love and ease increased.
These are few things I have tried new recently. Have a fun day.

Work recently has become more of a challenge not because more has to be done, because more people have to do it from distance. Some of the social and behavioral cues that team members observe when they are together is lost. This loss in information has lead to additional work for many. They have to do additional follow ups and coordination when the things don’t move as per the plan.
We have highlighted the challenge of communication. Then there is challenge of team members slacking in the work. Many have taken work from home has a vacation, and started enjoying with the family or in some cases even forced to be with the family. This causes others to take up the slack and complete the work.
Work is a jigsaw puzzle to begin with. Everyone is trying to solve a problem of each other and we are getting paid for that. In to this, a new challenge is added, that is to work away from office, where the environment, the motivation and the urgency is felt. When at home, the same urgency cannot be felt by every team member. The feeling or need to solve a problem gets postponed at times, leading to built up of back log.
Once the problems have piled up, then bringing order among the problems itself becomes a challenge. Some team members can get so overwhelmed, their entire load may be transferred to others.
Even though the work from home has increased our work, we can still reduce it by really taking care of each of our team members. We are more of a team, the entire world of brothers and sisters are working towards making the world a place of happiness and prosperity. Keeping this in mind at every decision we take, the work on each other can be reduced and wealth can be created.
Have a fun and happy life…

Happy new year to all.
Being assertive is a skill that is indispensable in any year. Being able to breath and center yourself in any situation is a skill that will help you to be assertive.
Being Happy is a life skill which needs to practiced every moment. (Book of Joy can be referred)
Being self aware and having self knowledge can be cultivated through taking new challenges at work, in family and in relationship. (Fearless Heart can be referred)
Being present in the moment is sub skill of being happy. This is a skill that can improve your learning, creativity and memory. Being present can increase your data interpretation and logical reasoning. (Full catastrophic living is go to book)
Being free from tyranny of our feelings which are created by our brains is needed of the hour.
Cultivating self esteem and able to argue for your points is another important skill that has to be practiced.
Being a visionary of your own life and able to set a path which is flexible to achieve your vision is final skill that can use all the above skills and lead a fabulous life.
Have a great and happy day.

In a world where it is difficult to learn even to breath without practice, it is so easy to take losses in our life without any practice. To be sad, one needs no practice.
To be alone, and miss those who don't want you in their life, needs no practice… It makes me think that any skill that comes without practice is not a skill at all, but addiction.
Funny, not really. It is a billion dollar Industry.
On the contrary, Skills that needs to be learnt always needs practice. To focus, meditate, memorise, solve problems, exercise, swim,write,type and even to read one needs practice.
Make music, bring imagination on a canvas, make a vision into a speech all needs practice. To frame a cohesive points for an argument, keeping your cool when making your points needs practice. Whether it is word play or martial arts, it needs practice.
Even to lie effectively one needs practice. So skills that I have learnt without practice is something I am practicing to forget…
(Can't help but smile, superb question)

Seemingly simple is to execute the stop losses when the price reaches the stop. Really hard is to execute the losing trade without thinking twice.
Idea behind stop.loss execution is to catch the failing trades fast and let the winning trade win for long time.
Based on the entry method you use, there will be lot of trades that will hit stop.loss. So keeping tight stop loss and losing only set amount per day is again simple but difficult to execute.
Van Tharpe books and Turtle system will give you...

Students all around want to spend less time and ace the examination. The younger they are more time of the learning is spent on bringing their wandering brain to concentrate on their task. There are small hacks the students can incorporate in their daily routine.
I have myself used the below tactics in my life and score top ranks in my higher secondary school, and maintained department topper for all 8 semester in Mechanical Engineering. I have suggested these to my friends, we got placed in many companies during our campus placements. Here goes…
More time is spend being happy, and the student learns the subject more his brain will retain. Happy students are more confident, and learn to be creative in bringing new solution to the challenge they face in learning.
2. Learning about Harmones: Children as young as 10 years are introduced to complex programming languages, and math theorems. They all must be thought about the harmones that elevate our mental state. Serotonin, Oxytocin, Endorphins and Dopamines.
Whenever they feel tired, or unable to concentrate they can try to ask for help intelligently. Parents too have to realise their wards might be going through some chemical challenges in their brain.
3. Meditation Training : Being able to calm the raging brain is a skill unto itself. Entire hours might be consumed by disturbed or agitated brain. Steadily working on tactics to bring the brain to a calm state can help students to retain what they learn very easily.
Students these days have role models who themselves need meditative training. Help from media, that shows meditative state brings lot more success can lead to lot more interest in this tactic.
Have a fun time learning.
Read Book of Joy follow it with Fearless heart. It gives you all the answer you want…

Japanese is having a written language that has been created to suit the need of a culture that is based on a long history which did not have its own written language. That makes it a young language, which means only those disciplined and have time can learn this language.
Languages by nature are designed to communicate which means it need not be easy to learn. After learning to speak 4 different languages (Hindi, Tamil, English and Japanese) this pattern is evident. Urge to communicate in us is so much that we surpass this difficulty with practice and experience.
If you are thinking of learning japanese to speak then reach out to best trainer out there, who can bring you up to speed in speaking within a year and half. To write and read it will take more time, assuming you are learning only kana and not kanji.
All the best for your endeavor.

Companies have thrived doing one thing for over a hundred years, and in cases of banks even 500 years. Most of the banks offer very specific services along with stability.
There are some companies that make confectioneries which have done only chocolates for more than 50 years. The examples are many to support the point thay longevity comes from doing one thing that the company is good at.
Diversification arises only when the company is unable to compete in what it does. Then it moves doing something else. The competitive advantage can be broken by many ways, and mostly it is something that founders could have foreseen.
Porters 5 forces model where the substitute for products, supply side pressure, customer side pressure, barrier for new entrants and Industry rivalry all contribute to the diversification.
Have a fun day

Profitable, it may not be in terms of money. It is extremely profitable in terms of experience and maturity one gets from running a business. That is wealth. I am sure, there is so much information around the concept of money, and how different it is from wealth.
Wealth is measured in the discretionary time one has in his life, and enjoying everything he wants. If you are looking for wealth, then you are going to create that in abundance, if you start business.
Take a look at various business you can start or enter into, hereKamal Raj's answer to What business or career is best if the only goal is to make as much money as possible (businesses to start, jobs to pursue, skills to learn)?
Humans love to build something to say their name, call it vanity or happiness in bringing the creativity to life or simply to feel the adrenaline course through the pre-historic brain. Business is one such building, that will give the fame, fierceness and fan his creativity.
Whether it is a corner store, doing busy turnover in simple breads or having multi-billion dollar assets slosshing in the balance sheets, and bank accounts there is wealth created. Take heed to the voice that is screaming at you, right now. Here is one more important idea to nail in my argument.
When you are young, single, living under parents house there is not much expenditure for yourself. Parents these days can afford to let their wards to take on risks after they complete under grad colleges, and learn something practical in doing the business.
The challenge it seems, is rudderless minds of the youngsters. If you are having a goal, that is to create wealth and use it get discretionary time. Then go all the way, and have a fun time running your own business. You will be unsinkable… rather unconquerable.

I asked myself, Why will I learn something new? I am curious to know how the world works, or I am searching for inspiration. Could be a new challenge in life. Want to help dear ones who are facing some trouble. To get a better job….The list will prolonged as I introspected sitting there with this question. Then I learnt something about myself from the pattern I saw in my answers.
I love myself when I learn something and love to help those around me. One of the 1st benefits of learning everyday, it helps you to love yourself.
It might seem altruistic to look from the point of my loved ones, it cannot be any farther from complete selfishness. I had learnt that being selfish, loving oneself, claiming happiness is the foremost step towards learning new things. World is expressed in most complex and beautiful way possible.
Learning it gives a sense of achievement and power to predict what might happen next. Predicting our future makes us feel more secure and confident. In the wilderness, our ancestor used all his senses along with instinct to learn his environment, so we are here today to learn more. Second benefit is, learning keeps us alive
Mind is a concept that outside our brain, while our brain senses the thoughts and ideas that are fleeting inside the mind. We have control over the brain, with our food, exercise, and the nourishment we take. Learning about how to use the brain, what makes it move in to flow, why it likes to be happy and safe, leads us to learn more.
3rd Benefit is learning provides us the warmth and excitement that provides motivation even on a day that is as dull as a rainy, snowy day in autumn. It is like mug of hot chocolate warmed up, and given to you in your cozy bed filled with colors and scents. Add to that wonderful conversations with friends and family. That is what learning is all about.
Triple benefits of learning is to be happy, alive and be excited. We all want excitement every day in our life, live it happily and be alive. Learn something new today, whip open your favorite book, click on that new course, pick up that new hobby.. Chop Chop… Have a fun day

Learning to Happy before anything else, and loving yourself to the fullest will be the starting point to be disciplined.
Being happy is the soul purpose of life, and practicing happiness is part of loving yourself. Accepting the way you are, embody humilty and humour, readily forgive, change perspective when struck in a connundrum, being compassionate, having gratitude and showing generosity, are the ways to joy and happiness.
Every discipline needs a Goal. Attract the Goal rather than setting a goal by yourself. Aim for achieving mastery in the subject that chooses you. Realise that school or college is place to truly find your passion, get clarity and infuse discipline. Mind can bring any idea to life, like a fertile land. When you plant the seeds, some will take hold and grow, nurture and nourish those goals with all your attention and are.
Discipline has to practiced in many areas of life. Exercise daily, atleast go for a jog in the morning. It helps to release Endorphins on of the important harmone. Even playing for hobby will do. More you can control your body, with your mind higher the self-confidence and faith in yourself. When you achieve small goals like jogging for 10 mins, making your abs flat etc can release dopamine, another good harmone. These all help in-directly to the studies. That is why, schools have play time included, and value extra curricular activities.
Mind is the starting point. Move your mind to self-awareness mode, and improve your self-esteem. Self-esteem is achieved through practice, and having a happy mindset. There are some strategies shared above with help of exercise to improved self-esteem. Another way is use Meditation, and increase your self-awareness.
Discipline starts with attention.Attention comes from the energy that you have. Energy comes from the food and drinks that you consume. Energy has to be high all through the day, so you can learn and retain. Also prolonged attention can be improved with self-awareness, which is again trained by meditation.
Taking breaks regularly from the grind is another important requirement. Using the weekends to reach out friends and having fun lunch, or visit local park and having a coffee etc can rejuvenate your mind. When you share the challenges you are facing with someone close to you, who is non-judgemental, lends you their ears can be very refreshing. When you air your challenges, you will find solution, and understand concepts much easily.
It is seldom one activity or input that achieves the desired results, when it comes to human behavior and improvement. To get the necessary score in an exam, achieve a certain status in life, go to certain designation in you job, all need multiple activities, with high level of attention, concentration, discipline, food habits. It is a complete life style change.
Have a great disciplined life…

One line answer. It depends on purpose of your life according to you. There are pros and cons for both the studies.
If your calling is in designing new products. Pulling all nighters to solve an intractable challenges. Being alone is your favorite passtime.Passionate about technology and it application. Eye for detail and repetition is in your blood then go for engineering
Your calling is in making something much bigger than yourself. Something that lasts longer than your life. Ability to make good friends and get them to help you on your vision. Ability to come up with bold ideas and influence those around you to support. Numbers are like breakfast cereals to you and reading reports is like full course meal. Then you better take Business as your major.
Basing it on your calling removes your choice, and let the options in front of you making the decision for you.

Eight months of remote working showed couple of interesting ideas that can be learnt and used effectively. The coordination was done between three different technical centers located in Japan, China and India. Customers were located in Americas, Europe and Asia.
Before having a meeting, communicate the agenda of the meeting and use the mail communication to begin the meeting
Use Excel / Presentation software on the screen sharing mode to list down the various conclusions that are being discussed. This might be a challenge at the beginning, but it can be mastered fast
Break down each activity into smaller components, and try to find who is correct resource to solve those activities before communicating. This will avoid mulitple mails or discussions
Use phone calls extensively to follow up on the action points that has been assigned. Whatsapp calls are a life saver. Colleague seems to be right beside you when the call happens.
Have the best earphones, it is an investment that can decide your mindset during a hour long discussions. Having your hands free can help you to come with new ideas by doodling on the paper, or use it to list the action that needs to be taken.
Multiple internet connection by using redundant service providers can help you to be connected, even if one of the service providers malfunction.
Meditate everyday and send love to everyone who is working with you. This helps to have a calm and positive mindset all through the day. Misunderstanding can be resolved easily, and free of frustration and anger.
Learning to actively listen is a skill that is rarely used, when the emotions and conflicting interests bear on a meeting. Being self-aware and interupt only when you have clear question to ask, is the best way to actively listen.
Finally, be jovial and happy all through the day. There can be anxieties, fears and angry moments. Reach out to your loved ones and discuss these frustrations regularly.

Atlas Shrugged was novel that introduced to me what will happen if the world stopped working when all the capitalist left to the mountains. Then promptly there was Global Lockdown, caused by Corona. The world’s capitalists and doers found ways around this situation, here we are today.
Harry potter series that I am currently reading is quiet interesting, owing to its magical beings and the ingenuity of the author in bringing to life a phenomenal world.
Novel that pushed me more toward the political philosophy is the following. First is Issac Asimov
Novels that made my spine shiver are the novels of Arthur C Clarke. No they are not thriller in the contemporary sense. One must read it understand the very situation, and what could happen if it continued…
I read myriad of other books that are related to improving our abiity to see patterns in the real world. After all the novels just give a one way the world could proceed. When you can see the patterns in the real world, then you can write novels from your imaginations….
I am still in awe with the imagination, nuance, logic and excellent naration of these authors. Have a fun time with these books.

Having such a goal is a very good way to begin.
Algorithms and data structures are important areas that google looks for in a coder. Ability to see a problem a hand and deciding which algorithm to use and what data structure to use comes with practicing.
Take your time to learn these two areas throughly. Then most of the programming companies would be willing to give you a job including google.

If a manager needed one skill then it is to cast a wide net with help of his team by following up regularly.
An activity, idea or customer whom we are trying to support is a school of fish which tries to get along with its status quo.
When you cast a net and want to change the status of fish, (even though you might eat them), you need full coordination of every member of your team. That occurs when you talk and meet with regularly.
The idea or vision you have for the team has to be reiterated to the team regularly. Whenever any meeting is done, make sure to use simple notepad or excel sheet to assign tasks and next steps to the members.
Meetings or discussions are used for tightening the grip of the net that has been cast or changing the extent to which it is cast. Ensure that more effective the communication, stronger the net
Happy leading the team.

Customers are the fuel tothe business. Creating new needs and satisfying them are purpose of a business.
Customer embodies a stereo type like female, 23 yrs old, salaried, resides in apartment, drives an hatchback. There are many stereotypes that are created by Business and then track the customers. They are also called customer demographics.
Tracking a customer offline through a sales process, or in a locality where the business is run is done through an observer. Really physical observer stan...

There is money in every business you do. What are you going to do with all the money you earn? First answer that. Using the money to experience the reality is very important.
Being a platform for the businesses themselves will be the easiest way to make more money. Like Google, Alibaba, Amazon etc, who are now platform that connects the customers to the suppliers. They are a brand, which acts as an intermediary, getting all the data from both sides of the sale.
Franchising the existing brands that sell products and services that people cannot live without is the next in line. If you want to make money, then start your own new franchise/ brand and build it to sell them. You need to be disciplined/ talented/ hard work to build it.
If you are starting out, then buying a franchise is like a house, that will provide you returns, experience of running business and contacts that you will need when you move out on your own.
Coffee shops, Burger joints, Pizza parlours, Bakeries and even car washes have got their franchises. If you love personal care related services, like hair saloon, cosmetic upgrades, even there is franchises for that. There goes, you can buy franchise or create franchise depending on your expertise
Stock Market : Trading or Investing in stocks are a very viable business if you are having idea of competitive edge.
The competitive edge is created after you have found a problem pattern, or stock price pattern. You can see the fish in the above pattern, and see that it is going upwards. You can take a bet that, it is will move up for atleast some more time. Based on that you take the stand as either buyer or seller in the market. It is a very deep subject, and requires time and skill to learn.
Consulting : Business is based on making other business better with your expetise on the process, knowledge, strategic ideas, best practices and contacts. This is one of the low money investment high returns business.
One can do it either working for a big organisation, or working solo. Having prior work experience will help in moving this direction. There are tomes of books about this topic.
The money made depends on the energy and time you spend on any of the above businesses. Identifying a problem or need that requires a solution, or showing that there is a problem and solving it requires time. Take your time and learn more about them.

Take a moment and think about your idea and why you want to communicate it? Start with the why?
Is it an argument that needs support or an information you are creating awareness about? Depending on that collect supporting points.
Be ready for opposing thoughts arising in listening minds. Do research on points that contradict your views and answer those in your speech.
Every point can be expressed with plain language or imaginable language. Use metaphors and allegory, especially stories to show your points strength.
Steadily build the points towards your central point and finally show how important is for the listening minds to support you. Your points must add to the momentum and finally enter their minds like waterfall falling on the ground.
Then give them time to think after all the splashing and crashing of your points has been completed. Use the pause to let their mind grasp your idea. Take a piercing look at your audience, and strongly believe they are supporting you.
As they are reflecting then you come to start of your speech, and say your cental point again and complete it. The idea is to have the speech to be circular and have a closure too.
Hope this idea helps. Have a wonderful time ahead.
Picture credit to Pixabay.com.

Communication when it effective, creates a strong connect between two or more people and their minds.
Minds of people can be connected with ideas and pictures. Pictures in minds can be created by using the 5 senses together.
When we communicate, mostly we use vocal or sight depending on speaking, body language or writing. When you add pictures that are drawn and described, create vivid metaphors and allegory, reminds the tastes and smells of the ideas that you communicate, a strong connect gets established.
Slow typing can be shown by above picture or words like typing like snail can be stringed together to create an image in the brain of your targets.
Most importantly having the mind in state of ease thru laughing and joking in the middle of communication is also important.
Smiling or scowling face is more memorable, pleasant emotions will be better palatable. And those faces need not be that of humans like abive. Here I use lots of pictures and allegory to create a connect.
I wrote the point I want to communicate here first. Then I moved in search of the pictures that can make the idea stand in your mind for a longer time.
How much time I must have gone into imagining the pictures? Not much, I had go out to free image websites like pixabay or freepics and search for some pictures using concepts I want to communicate. Do support the artists by atleast citing the source like how I have done here, so others too can support them.
Giving attention to a thought adds energy to it, and it starts growing and morphing. More it changes, newer and innovative it becomes.
Take the on demand world with the best communication and connecting people with a smile.

Have books everywhere. On your table, cell phone, tea table, and near your bed. Like this any moment you can start reading.
Read atleast 3 different book to keep you moving from one to another. Also try fiction, nonfiction, self help or other category side by side.
Fill you hard disk and laptops with loads of books that you can browse time and again. Have a set of favorite books that you can take if you have lost interest in new ones.

Good team communication looks like a well laid fishing net. Any idea that is entering the team is caught and made into actions or reality.
Good Communication in team creates a “flow” state among the team members. This means everyone knows what everyone else is doing and where they are. Both physically and mentally.
Good communication ensures that objectives of the team comes first. Rest of the individual needs are sent to the background. Social skills of each members magically increase. It is like each other passion is driving the other to achieve the objectives.
Good communication is fun and speeds up time. Gives you more energy than it takes to communicate. Leads to new breakthrough every other moment. It is like being connected to the mind of team members.
Have a fabulous day…

Why you are working out has to be decided. If it is for building your body for competing then 2 hrs a day is fine. If it is to gain weight and looking fit, go for an hour. If it is for maintaining stamina then 30 mons or so is sufficient.
Workout is best when do it like a hobby.
1. Mastering your body,
2. learning how to get more energy from it,
3. giving it additional flexibility,
4. challenging it with new moves
are some reasons.
Base your timing and intensity of exercise on these, you will have a remarkable experience in gym. You will be your own inspiration. Motivation will be limitless. Faith in you will increase steadily. Body will start listening to you like a machine that is programmed for your will.
Have a day of wonder and possibility.

I throughly enjoyed the control and discipline I got as I reached 27. It is fabulous what your mind and body can do as it ages, on the contrary to what you hear.
I learnt to do jiu jitsu and kick boxing. Donned a six pack abs and could do hand stand push up. Before that I used to struggle for basic push up.
Then comes the ability to learn new concepts. Philosophy and psychology became easier. Basic level understanding became easier. Arguments in my life reduced drastically since philosophy thought how to argue without attachment. Psychology showed how to understand people better.

The table topic session can be very useful for the guests, where they can give a try on table topics.
The meeting quality can be found by attending the meeting once, and with online option due to Covid, one can join from the comfort of home couch. Connect to the VPM of that toastmasters club, and I am sure they would help you on your journey to become a very good speaker and leader.
Happy Public Speaking.

Toastmaster and Rotary club has joined hands recently to make the best of both the worlds.
Rotary gives access to unique social circle in any city you visit. It also enables you to find like minded people to connect with. There are other benefits like getting to know a city better than travelling alone.
Toastmasters provide the above from the point of developing your confidence and speaking skills. There is pathways module that introduces you to new skills that can be learnt. Pathways is like a...

Stage fright occurs due to lack of self confidence, self esteem and negative self talk. Thinking like the following
I have listed some of the talks that went into me when I took stage in front of my office colleagues 2 years ago. Promptly I got bombarded with questions and criticized for the way of my presentation.
I decided that lot has to be changed in me, especially when it comes to getting things done. I joined a local toastmaster club. The pathways module in toastmasters gives you a well rounded introduction to public speaking, leadership, strategic thinking, confidence building and team management.
I stopped listening to the voice in my head and gave a vision for that voice to build. Slowly the voice started advising how to bring the vision to reality. Voice in your head becomes supportive the moment you give it a problem that is interesting and game changing to solve.
Also feeding it your confidence with help of supportive group of people is important. Following that the voice becomes your friend. It attracts the loving and cherising thoughts for you capitalise on. Steadily you will start forgeting that you have stage frieght, and start enjoying even looking forward to taking the stage.
I have seen this transformation in myself and couple of my friends too. I am glad to have gotten a chance to provide some insights into stage frieght. Removing the frieght from your brain is the first step. Above is the process for the same. Hope it helps.

After reading countless sci-fi and fiction novels, I recently moved my attention to Political philosophy. I was stunned to realise most of the phenomenal novels were based on simple philosophical connundrums that has left the great thinkers of the past and present perplexed.
If you are reading for pleasure, to pass time then go for the fiction first. If you are interested in honing your thinking and reasoning skills then take up philosophy. A pro for philosophy is you can puzzle your social circle with interesting conundrums that you cook up after reading the philosophies of Aristotle, Kant, Bentham, Marx and Ayn Rand…
Looking forward to one more enlightened soul… Have a fun day.

Robots… My dream is to have companion like R.Giskard Reventelov. He is much more advanced than Siri or Cortana that we are acquainted with. Spoiler Alert, if you are reading Foundation / Robot series of Issac asimov…. Giskard can read the thoughts and even correct emotions of humans.!!!

Wishing to see a future where Robots are taking care of humans.. Have a fun day.

The disease afflicting the major population of this world is attention deficit. We all want to have continued attention, so we can get many things done and be healthy. Here are some strategies that one can use to get some attention on what they are doing.
There are many books out there speaking about many of these topics. Knowing these strategies are there, and it can be used to focus is more importtant.

Intelligent investor book gives a complete overview of accounting, business strategy and valuation methods at one place.
These are important to a practicing investor. I would suggest you to read the book with patience and concentration.
Book of Joy. Only one that I keep as reference book for happiness and life.

Business sales can be checked in following ways.
Standing in front of the business and seeing how many customers enter for business and how much products they carry can give you a approximate information
Checking the number of salesman in a business is another way to understand how much sales they are making. Though this method can be wrong depending on the business location.
Getting hold of the PnL sheet of the business from the auditior is straightforward way of seeing the revenue.
Connecting with the suppliers of the business and asking them for information can be helpful. It will take time though.
Cold calling the business and ask for information regarding the issues they are facing in the business and trying to help them as a consultant can be very interesting way. This is done after considerable research is done on the business.
Hope it helps. Good day.

In life we are all alone even in close relationships unless we learn to be self aware. Understanding this is the first step towards being happy with yourself. Once you are happy about your life and think positive about it, best things happen.
Loving yourself will make your alone time a great asset. You will find great books to read, wonderful hobbies to pursue, places that are exotic to visit and simply have a good time. When the paths of others cross yours, steadily your relationship will increase.
That said, you can try Bumble, Tinder, Toastmaster clubs, or joining clubs of your taste and meet new people. The point is to explore new horizons within your reach.
Another strategy is taking a new project in your life. Like improving your health through yoga, meditation, exercise. All these can be done either alone or in a group. Pls beware of cults that form around these kind of self improvement ideas.
Final strategy is that you start a cult or following for yourself. There are so many like you feeling restless and unable to be alone. Reach out to them and provide your support and ideas. I am sure you will feel connected and fulfilled. This is like a volunteer work that you can undertake in your community.
All these are helpful after you are loving and caring about yourself. Have a wonderful time.

Concentration is an outcome of our will power. The power is derived from the energy we possess and the reason we want to concentrate. Without these two concentration will have no point of focus..
To train your will power is to meditate regularly on a focus point that you like the most. It could be affirming quality or positive outcomes or simply breath. Even a sort of prayer will develop your concentration.
As you take the first steps be loving and encouraging to youraself. Because self esteem is a very important for will power. Believe in yourself that concentrating is easy and its benefits are innumerable.
Have a happy day.

Follow up calls are the bread and butter of not just sales but everything that Involves people and managing the tasks.
Easiest way to.manage the sales call is by keeping a project timeline and call based on the level of completion of that project. Project could be simple onboarding a customer to delivering a complex product that involves so many stakeholders.
Second way is to have a regular follow up like calling a friend and having small talks. Here the intention is to build rapport rather than getting things done.
Third is following up for new opportunity or request access to senior level contacts. This way to expand your reach in the company provides a good hold on the future projects and business.
Finally approaching for reference once the project is completed. Based on the experience client faced , asking him for more new business either outside his company or country.
Hope this helps. Wonderful day ahead….

Why you want to remember what you read?
Seems like a silly question? It starts with answering that question. If you have a good reason, or atleast intuition on why you want remember everything that you read, then you will.
Assuming you have good reason or intuition first. Here are some simple tactics you can use.
Anatomy of Attention: Attention is the fuel for the memory. Attention comes from the energy your brain has any moment. Energy is sourced out of the blood that is coursing through your brain. Blood that is full of energy, and not tainted with unwanted harmones can increase your brain efficiency. So the food you eat, the information you assimilate and your state during reading all impact your attention. Why to be such detailed about attention? Because, that is how you remember.
Anatomy of Detail: More you go into the details of anything, the better you can imagine, make pictures out of concepts, attach earlier ideas to it and make it vivid, bring it life by animating in your mind’s theater and keep it there for a long time. Details are possible when you give attention to the present. Not only when you read, when you do anything including breathing. In a single word, you must be self-aware and be in meditative state every waking moment. Having photographic memory, or simply able to remember whatever you see and read is possible when you are self-aware.
Anatomy of Self-awareness: Happiness is the fuel for being self-aware. Moment you are happy, you stay in the present and time flow rapidly. The more you are happy, there is no need to dwell in the past or fantasize the future. So learning the art of happiness is prime to improve your memory. Being kind and loving to yourself is start for meditating and improving your self-awareness.
Hope all these strategies and tactics help you to move wholistically into improving your memory.

Subconscious brain is like a computer chip but the mind is like a software. To reprogram or train your mind, the only way is to program your brain with its own language.
Brains language is words and pictures. The more vivid pictures the words or thoughts create, better the brain can retain them and get trained. The subconscious brain is a repeater chip which will remember and play the picture again and again endlessly until you reprogram it.
How to do it?
Sit still in a place and try to calm your mind like meditating. Then bring the picture or the action that you want to occur in you. It could be having a great time, feeling connected to your friends, satisfying trips or even wild imagination like flying on a space ship to mars that has been colonised. Hold that thought, go deeper in to the details. Create the situation and the surroundings that you are in. Feel as if you are in that situation.
More the detail stronger the programming will hold in the subconscious brain. After ten to 20 sittings, you will notice that your brain starts thinking more about the idea that you trained it on.
One difference between the fantasies and such imagination is that, you will act upon any opportunity that might arise to make the imagination come true. That action is the difference maker.
Happy training.
